/ˈdʒɪɡ.ər/ us/-ɚ/) a type of flea (= very small jumping insect) that lays eggs beneath an animal's or person's skin
US (also harvest mite) a type of mite (= very small animal similar to a spider) that lays eggs under an animal's or person's skin causing small red bumps that are very itchy (= you want to scratch them)
